metadata.title: Sea Level Heights - Japan - 1961 to Present

creators.name: Oceanographic Department, Japan Oceanographic Data Center (JODC)

metadata.description:
This data file contains hourly value of sea level derived from tide gauge observations, which were conducted by Japan Cast Guard, Japan Meteorological Agency and Hokkaido Development Agency, and also contains the observation data at Showa Station of Antarctica.  

[ A TCODE project ]
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Archive and service as National Oceanographic Data Center in Japan.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Continually

Access constraints: These data are NOT included in the holdings of the Permanent  Service for Mean Sea Level in Bidston.

Use constraints: None
